text: what am i supposed to say? sure, penny, i'm cool with your old boyfriend sleeping in your apartment. well, leonard, it doesn't matter if you're cool or not because i'm penny and i'm pretty and i can do whatever the hell i want! oh, i get it! you think you're doing me a favour just by being in a relationship with me! no, no, leonard! i'm doing you a favour just by being in the same room as you!
